      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void crossCollision(IPawn entity1, IPawn entity2)
      This method is used in order to know every case of collision with every entity (Monster, Spell, Player) Here we're comparing the position of an entity 1 with an entity 2
      boolean wallCollision(IPlayer player, Order order)
      This method allow us to create every case of wall collision With every order we're increasing or decreasing the value of x or y of our player in order to manage the wall collision
      boolean wallCollision(ISpell spell)
      This method allow us to create every case of collision but this time for the spell Then we're doing a test in order to return if the spell can penetrate or not something

      • wallCollision

        public boolean wallCollision(IPlayer player,
                             Order order)
        This method allow us to create every case of wall collision With every order we're increasing or decreasing the value of x or y of our player in order to manage the wall collision
        Parameters:
        player - The player
        order - The order to verify
        Returns:
        boolean True if the player can go where he wants to go

      • wallCollision

        public boolean wallCollision(ISpell spell)
        This method allow us to create every case of collision but this time for the spell Then we're doing a test in order to return if the spell can penetrate or not something
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        boolean True if the spell can go where it wants to go
